column2: Nestin-TVA; ATRX flox/flox; Ink4a f/f; Pten f/f
Nestin-TVA; ATRX flox/flox; Ink4a f/f; Pten f/f

Upon examination, it was difficult to determine where the growth started and where the skull and brain began. The growth and the skull were separated as much as possible, and will be dissected after 24 hrs of formalin fixation.
